name: Torio Mike
description: was born in garden city but raised troy. I love this area it’ll always been my home.I’m a Laid back Italian guy who enjoys spending time with friends and family and meeting new people. I have one sister and my family means the world to me. I enjoy fishing,bodybuilding,comedy shows long walks. A perfect night for me is getting my family together for a bbq a nice dinner for everyone. I try to always remain positive and be in a good mood. I like to go out and have a good meal over stimulating conversation. In terms of going on dates, I am not very hard to please. As long as I am spending quality time with my significant other, I am a happy guy. I believe in karma and that you should always treat others how you would like to be treated. I am looking for a women that is fun loving and spontaneous. Some other characteristics I am looking for include: being close to family, sense of humor , im not perfect and I don’t expect anyone else to be either. Relationships require effort by each partner. Good communication is vital for me and the willingness to make certain compromises to better the relationship. I’m excited to meet some new people and see what this site is all about!
